title: The Wall Street Journal: Elaine Wynn pushes to overhaul Wynn Resorts board with new directors
text:
Wynn Resorts Ltd.’s largest shareholder, Elaine Wynn, demanded the company move swiftly to restructure its board and improve its corporate governance as regulators continue to investigate the company’s handling of sexual-misconduct allegations against her ex-husband, former Chief Executive Steve Wynn.

Ms. Wynn said in a letter to the board Tuesday that she was focused both on maximizing the company’s value and on “fully restoring its reputation and in transforming it into a corporate-governance leader,” according to an SEC...
